#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>

int main() {
        int T;
        scanf("%d", &T);
        int check[256];
        char s[201];
        while(T--) {
                scanf("%s", s);
                memset(check, 0, 256*sizeof(int));
                char *index = s;
                while (*index != '\0') {
                	check[*index] ++;
                        index ++;
                }
                int c = 0;
                for (int i=0;i<256;i++) {
                	c += check[i]/2 + check[i]%2;
                }
                printf("%d\n", c);
        }
        return 0;
}
